DOC.brief_summary: Untreated ulnar styloid fracture may affect the outcomes of distal radial fracture patient treated with external fixation.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Ulnar Styloid Fracture on the Outcome of Distal Radial Fractures Treated With External Fixation
DOC.criteria: unstable distal radial fracture fixed with external fixator multiple fracture open fracture nerve injury vascular injury
